propel.core.tracing
Class Stopwatch

java.lang.Object
  propel.core.tracing.Stopwatch

public class Stopwatch
extends java.lang.Object

Stop watch class for measuring time taken to execute some code. This is not a thread-safe class.

Constructor Summary
Stopwatch()
          Default constructor
 
Method Summary
 long getElapsedMicros()
          Returns the approximate total elapsed microsecond count.
 long getElapsedMillis()
          Returns the approximate total elapsed millisecond count.

          Returns the total elapsed nanosecond count.

          Returns the approximate total elapsed second count.

          Resets the total nanosecond count.

          Starts the stop watch.

Constructor Detail

public Stopwatch()
Default constructor

Method Detail

startNew

public static Stopwatch startNew()
Static instance creation method, returns a new started stopwatch

start

public void start()
Starts the stop watch.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the stop watch is started already

stop

public void stop()
Stops the stop watch.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the stop watch is not stopped

reset

public void reset()
Resets the total nanosecond count. Also stops the stop watch if it is running

Returns the total elapsed nanosecond count.
